name: The Drip (Gold)
description:
Brand new from OnchMovement comes the Liquefy Collection!

Sizzling under the blazing sun, working on that perfect tan, your hot summer body is hitting its melting point liquefying anything that comes in contact. When this piece touches your neck you will transform to a pool of cool and elegance. 

Oozing from a 14” high quality gold toned chain with a lobster clasp, each drippage is plated to perfection in14k Gold and measures approx 1.5” long and 2” across. 

Every piece is branded on the back with the signature OnchMovement pretzel and can be turned around and worn to show your OM pride!

Sexy and Chic, The Drip is the perfect unisex summer accessory.

Handmade in USA

Original Price $85

name: The Drip (Silver)
description:
Brand new from OnchMovement comes the Liquefy Collection!

Sizzling under the blazing sun, working on that perfect tan, your hot summer body is hitting its melting point liquefying anything that comes in contact. When this piece touches your neck you will transform to a pool of cool and elegance. 

Oozing from a 14” high quality silver toned chain with a lobster clasp, each drippage is silver toned plated to perfection and measures approx 1.5” long and 2” across. 

Every piece is branded on the back with the signature OnchMovement pretzel and can be turned around and worn to show your OM pride!

Sexy and Chic, The Drip is the perfect unisex summer accessory.

Handmade in USA

Original Price $85

name: Dripping Pearl Necklace
description:
A pearl necklace is a staple piece for any serious jewelry collector, so here is a classic pearl necklace that will always leave you dripping in elegance and style. From the OnchMovement Liquefy collection, this pearl necklace is one you can wear over and over again. 

Each Silver (Silver tone Plated) or Gold (14k Gold Plated) drippage measures approx 1.5” long and 2” across and as an added bit of elegance oozes from a 15” high quality strand of glass pearls with a lobster clasp. Every piece is branded on the back with the signature OnchMovement pretzel and can easily be turned around and worn to show your OM pride!

Please select Silver or Gold tone Dripping Pearl Necklace.

Handmade in USA

Original Price $95

name: Lucky Bones (14K Gold Plated)
description:
Feeling Lucky? Meet our two very playful dinosaurs! Excavated from Onch's own backyard, it's impossible to keep these two inseparable best friends apart. The Lucky Bones is one chunky and funky necklace perfect for big personalities!!

Each dinosaur pendant is hand cast metal 14K gold plated to perfection. measures approximately 4 1/2". The Lucky Bones are connected by high quality large gold tone chain measuring 15" with a 4" extender chain. 

Original Price $250

Handmade in USA

photo #3 (courtesy of Johnny Wujek)
Sky Ferreira wearing Lucky Bone by Onch Movement for Nylon Magazine shoot. Styled by Johnny Wujek

name: Lucky Bones
description:
Feeling Lucky? Meet our two very playful dinosaurs! Excavated from Onch's own backyard, it's impossible to keep these two inseparable best friends apart. The Lucky Bones is one chunky and funky necklace perfect for big personalities!!

Each dinosaur pendant is hand casted in metal and measures approximately 4 1/2". The Lucky Bones are connected by high quality large gun metal chain measuring 15" with a 4" extender chain. 

Handmade in USA

Original Price $155.00

photo #3 (courtesy of Johnny Wujek)
Sky Ferreira wearing Lucky Bone by Onch Movement for Nylon Magazine shoot. Styled by Johnny Wujek

name: Bad Bones Necklace
description:
Dark, bold, with a splash of rock, the Bad Bones Necklace are an edgy statement to make for any bone fashionista. 

Four handmade black glass bones measuring approximately 1/2" are interwoven into a high quality silver toned link chain. Five sharp spikes hang below and highlight the bones. High quality black matte extender chain is used for extra length. 

Bad Bones are available in two sizes of 17" or 19". Please select your size below.

Handmade in USA

name: The Bone Bracelets (Good Bone / Bad Bone)
description:
Part of the BEAUTIFUL BONES COLLECTION, The Good Bone Bad Bone Bracelets are a perfectly understated accessory. 

Three handmade glass black or white bones measuring approximately 1/2" each are strung together with high quality matte finish black chain. Available in two sizes, 8 or 9 inches. 

*Beautiful Bones are guaranteed to bring good luck.

Handmade in the USA

Bracelets do not come as a set. Each order is for one bracelet.

name: RAINBONES
description:
Fun, magical, but still edgy the Rainbones are a colorful new twist to bone fashion. 

Four handmade white glass bones measuring approximately 1/2" are interwoven into a high quality gold toned link chain. Five rainbow leather tassels highlight this bright necklace. 

Rainbones are available in two sizes of 17" or 19". Please select your size below.

*Rainbones are guaranteed to bring good luck. 

Handmade in USA

name: Mr Potato Head
description:
Mr. Potato Head by Onch Movement retails for $160.00. Each piece is gold plated and hangs from a sturdy, high quality 20” matte black chain. It comes with removable eyes that double as a earring. Earring is gold plated sterling silver. 

Each one is handmade in the USA.

photo #3, #4 
Cher Lloyd rocking her Mr Potato Head Necklace on X-Factor Australia

name: The Poison Bite
description:
Inspired by the Onch's love for the classic fairy tale Snow White, OnchMovement Jewelry presents the Poison Apple Bite. Unlike the fairy tale, our version won't have you dying from poison, instead it will have everyone else dying of envy.  

Each apple (complete or eaten) measures approximately 2" x 2" and is hand painted to give it that perfect crisp apple look. The Poison Bite is connected by a 14" high quality green metal chain with a 2inch gold extender chain connected with a gold toned lobster clasp.

Originally $80.00
HANDMADE IN THE USA

photo #3, #4 (courtesy of Wire Image) 
Cher Lloyd wearing her custom Poison Bite at Hard Rock Times Square.

name: Double Twist Pegasus Pony (Gold Plated)
description:
From THE DOUBLE TWIST PEGASUS PONY COLLECTION by Onch Movement comes the Double Twist Pegasus Pony Gold

Each Pony measures approx. 2.5" and is gold plated both front and back. Both the tail and mane are made from pink synthetic hair that measures approx. 6-8" for the mane and 6-8" for the tail. Each pony hangs from a link chain measuring approx. 20" in length. 

Combining metal and hair, while challenging, seemed the perfect direction to go.  A fresh new, twist from a unique designer.  This collection represents more than just jewelry, it’s wearable art.

The Double Twist Pegasus Ponies are friendly, fun and the perfect companion for any neck. Each Pony comes direct from the salon with freshly primped hair that can be trimmed to its owners liking.

HANDMADE IN THE USA
Hasbro and it's logo, MY LITTLE PONY and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro and are used with permission.
Copyright 2012 Hasbro. All Rights Reserved.
Manufactured and Distributed by Onch Movement, LLC

name: Double Twist Pegasus Pony (Silver)
description:
From THE DOUBLE TWIST PEGASUS PONY COLLECTION by Onch Movement comes the Silver Toned Double Twist Pegasus Pony.

Each Pony measures approx. 2.5" and is cast in metal with a silver tone finish. Both the tail and mane are made from blue synthetic hair that measures approx. 6-8" for the mane and 6-8" for the tail. Each pony hangs from a link chain measuring approx. 20" in length. 

Combining metal and hair, while challenging, seemed the perfect direction to go.  A fresh new, twist from a unique designer.  This collection represents more than just jewelry, it’s wearable art.

The Double Twist Pegasus Ponies are friendly, fun and the perfect companion for any neck. Each Pony comes direct from the salon with freshly primped hair that can be trimmed to its owners liking.

HANDMADE IN THE USA
Hasbro and it's logo, MY LITTLE PONY and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro and are used with permission.
Copyright 2012 Hasbro. All Rights Reserved.
Manufactured and Distributed by Onch Movement, LLC

NOTE: Ponies start shipping June 1st

name: Onch Teddies (Pink)
description:
Just in time for the Holidays, comes a brand new necklace from OnchMovement, the Onch Teddies! Perfect to wear, perfect to cuddle, adopt yours and snuggle up today. 

Onch Teddies are available in three colors: Pink, Teddy Brown and Blue. Each Onch Teddies necklace contains 5 miniature plush bears measuring approx. 7" (across all the bears). Each set of Onch Teddies hang from a 12" heavy duty chain, non-tarnish gold tone chain with a 4" extender.

Handmade in USA

Original Price $65.00

description:
Photo #2 (courtesy of Ryan Seacrest Twitter)
Ryan Seacrest with Nicki Minaj

Nicki Minaj in her dazzling Mystical Blue Starsicle Earrings at the American Idol Results show March 29, 2012 Los Angeles

name: Rainbow Fries
description:
It's RAINBOW FRIDAY! And what better way to celebrate then with the newest creation from the colorful mind of Onch Movement, Rainbow Fries!!! (the perfect Barbie Food!)

Deep fried in a vibrant pot of rainbow, these rainbowful fries come as a set of red, orange, yellow, green and blue all deliciously strung together to form a whimsical playful necklace.

Each set of fries hang from a heavy duty gold toned 10" chain and are separated by high quality multi colored square acrylic beads. 
(Each Rainbow Fries necklace comes with a 3 inch extender chain attached.)

Don't miss out! Get your Rainbow Fries today. Perfect for anyone looking to add a little fun and color to their life :) 

HANDMADE in the USA

Original Price $85.00

name: Onch Pretzels
description:
Onch Pretzles were inspired by my sudden cravings for sugar coated pretzels! 100% Handmade with Polymer Clay and a Swarovski rhinestone accent. Comes in 9 vibrant colors!

Red, Pink, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Purple, Black and White

Actual Size 2.5 inches

Each piece is unique! A perfect accessory for the summer or any pretzel fanatic!

*EVERY PRETZEL COMES WITH A 25" BEADED CHAIN
This piece is Double Baked...so its super tough!!

*Each pretzel is hand-stamped for authenticity. 

*REMEMBER: When ordering please specify which color.

Handmade in USA

Original Price $45

Photo #2, #3, #4 (courtesy of Getty Images)
Singer Nicki Minaj Rocking her custom made HUGE Lilac and Pink Onch Pretzel Necklace at New York Mercedes-Benz Fashion Week

name: Rainbow Swirl Cone
description:
From the magical world of Onch Movement, comes The Rainbow Swirl Cone. This colorful treat is made from a blend of whimsical flavors, custom twisted to perfectasy! Each swirl is hand crafted and hangs from a high quality, sturdy 19" link chain. Dripping from the swirl is a large teardrop crystal.

This deliciously fashionable necklace is guaranteed to never melt.

Handmade in USA


Photo #3, #4, #5 (courtesy of MTV)
Nicki Minaj Rocking her Onch Movement Rainbow Swirl Cone at the 2011 MTV Video Music Awards (VMAs). HUGE Congrats Nicki for winning "Best Hip Hop Video"

name: Giant Purple Onch Pretzel
description:
The Giant Onch Pretzel is being made available for a limited time!!!

Measuring approximately 5.5" across, each pretzel pendant is hand crafted and stamped on the back for authenticity. 

Each Onch pretzel hangs from a 16" strand of round pink lucite beads with an extra 2" gold tone, link chain for size adjustments. 

Handmade in the USA

Original Price: $350.00

Photo #3, #4, #5 (courtesy of Getty Images)
Nicki Minaj Rocking her custom made HUGE Lilac and Pink Onch Pretzel Necklace at New York Mercedes-Benz Fashion Week

name: Pink Fried Chicken (Wing)
description:
Get it while it's hot! 
PINK FRIED CHICKEN!!!

Deep fried and extra crispy, the Pink Fried Chicken Wing is bold statement for any fashionista. Each chicken wing is hand battered so no two pieces are the same. Made from 100% animal free material!

This juicy wing measures approximately 4.5" tip to tip and hangs from a 17" heavy duty gold tone link chain with an extra 5" inch adjustable sizing chain. 

Handmade (And Fried) in the USA

photo #2, #3, #4, #5 (courtesy of Getty Images) 
Nicki Minaj Rocking her Pink Fried Chicken necklace at iHeartRadio Music Festival 2011 in Las Vegas

name: The Bacon Bracelet
description:
More wearable meat from the Meat-cessory Collection is the Bacon Bracelet. Made from 100% animal free material each bracelet is hand sculpted and painted. 

Each piece of bacon measures between 6-8" inches and attaches with a gun metal clasp and jump ring.

Handmade in the USA

name: The Bacon Necklace
description:
The newest addition to the Meat-cessories Collection is the Bacon Necklace. Made from 100% animal free material each necklace is hand sculpted and painted. 

Each piece of bacon measures between 7-8" inches and hangs from a 16' inch antiqued brass linked chain. 

Handmade in the USA

name: Rubber Ducky Necklace
description:
Just in time for Summer, the Rubber Duckies are here!!! Onch Movement presents the Rubber Ducky Necklace. Perfect for a stroll on the beach or a dip in the pool, these little duckies are must have summer accessory. 

Each necklace consists of 5 little ducks all in a row, connected by acrylic bubble beads and high quality, sturdy, link chain. The Rubber Ducky Necklace measures 21" from end to end.

***For a limited time buy a Rubber Ducky Necklace and we'll throw in a Rubber Ducky Ring as a bonus gift!***

(Some ducks have been known to quack!)

Original Price $85.00

Photo #2 (courtesy of Kim Kardashian's Twitter)
Kim Kardashian wearing rubber ducky necklace as a headband at my dear friend Joyce Bonelli's Baby shower :)

name: Rubber Ducky Earrings
description:
Just in time for Summer, the Rubber Duckies are here!!! Onch Movement presents Rubber Ducky Earrings. Perfect for a stroll on the beach or a dip in the pool, these little duckies are must have summer accessory. 

Each earring consists of 1 little duck, on a non-tarnish, gold or silver toned 3" hoop, strung with acrylic bubble beads.

***For a limited time buy Rubber Ducky Earrings and we'll throw in a Rubber Ducky Ring as a bonus gift!***

(Some ducks have been known to quack!)

Original Price $45.00

name: Rubber Ducky Ring
description:
Just in time for Summer, the Rubber Duckies are here!!! Onch Movement presents the Rubber Ducky Ring. Perfect for a stroll on the beach or a dip in the pool, this little duckies is the perfect, understated summer accessory.

Each Rubber Ducky RIng is adjustable and will fit any finger.

(Some ducks have been known to quack!)

Original Price $14.99

name: Onch Movement Silver Man Pretzel
description:
The Newest incarnation of the OnchMovement Signature Pretzel is the MAN PRETZEL. Made from pewter and stamped on the back for authenticity, the Man Pretzel is an understated, masculine, and makes a great present for your man!

Each man pretzel measures approx. 1.75" x 1.25" and hangs from 24" inch fabric rope cord. 

Made in the USA.

name: Onch Movement Gold Man Pretzel
description:
The Newest incarnation of the OnchMovement Signature Pretzel is the MAN PRETZEL. Made from brass and stamped on the back for authenticity, the Man Pretzel is an understated, masculine, and makes a great present for your man!

Each man pretzel measures approx. 1.75" x 1.25" and hangs from 24" inch fabric rope cord. 

Made in the USA.

name: Onch Movement Silver Pretzel Choker
description:
The Onch Movement Pretzel Choker is the perfect accessory for the fashionista looking for an understated way to get caught up in the Onch Movement! 

Classy and chic this pretzel is made from pewter, measures 1.2" x .75 inches with a 15.5" heavy duty link chain that attaches with a toggle clasp through the pretzel. Each pretzel is stamped on the back for authenticity.

Made in the USA

name: Onch Movement Gold Pretzel Choker
description:
The Onch Movement Pretzel Choker is the perfect accessory for the fashionista looking for an understated way to get caught up in the Onch Movement! 

Classy and chic this pretzel is made from brass, measures 1.2" x .75 inches with a 15.5" heavy duty link chain that attaches with a toggle clasp through the pretzel. Each pretzel is stamped on the back for authenticity.

name: Onch Candy Dots Large
description:
You've heard of dripping in diamonds but how about dripping in dots....candy dots that is! This candy blinged, rainbow platter is perfect for anyone looking to make a bold but sweet statement. Pop art at it's best this piece is chunky and funky. 

A 1.5" x 4.5" laser cut candy platter, comes on a high quality, sturdy, 20" heavy duty, link chain.

Handmade in USA

name: Onch Candy Dots Medium
description:

Comes with a 16" ball chain.

Handmade in USA

name: Onch Movement Mugo
description: Onch Movement Mugo Promo Video Click Here to watch MUGO have been known to be a shy race of creatures, often keeping in the background, but recently have started to come forward and show themselves to the world. They are timid beings, each highly individualized to their owner. But the Onch MUGO was born a little bit different! It's loud, it's colorful, it's creative, and it loves to be seen EVERYWHERE!!! With the combined features of an MP3 player and flash drive, this Limited Edition Onch MUGO offers style and fashion, as well as functionality for an affordable price. Take your MUGO to the gym or wear it around your neck as a bold fashion statement for a night out! Every Onch MUGO comes bundled with a microfiber bag , instruction manuel and earphones. Onch MUGO features: Enhanced memory: 2GB memory to store your music, videos, photos or important documents. Compatible with MAC OS X and Windows 98, VISTA and XP. Limited Edition design from Onch Movement. Rechargeable Battery - up to 8 hours of continuous play. Plug and Play feature. Direct USB connection - no cables needed. SHIPPING NOW! **Onch was Spotted rocking his Onch Movement Mugo by Hollywood.tv Click Here to watch

name: The Leveler
description:
The Onch Leveler - An original design by Onch

We all need to find our balance, what better way to find it then
with your very own Onch Level Necklace!!

Available in two level sizes
Small or Large , please select your option below! 
(only the size of level is different)

*EVERY LEVELER COMES WITH A 16" BEADED CHAIN

name: The MEAT-LACE
description: Warm up the grill and get your neck ready for a tasty new creation from the OnchMovement Meat-cessory line, the MEAT-LACE! The MEAT-LACE is guaranteed to never spoil! No matter how many times you wear it, the MEAT-LACE will look just as fresh and delicious as the day it was first cut. Need to add flavor to an outfit? Grab a slab and some attention with the MEAT-LACE, perfect for any occasion. Lady Gaga and her famous meat dress serve as direct inspiration for this creation. The outrageous and controversial meat dress caused quite a stir among the fashion world, animal lovers and activists. (But FEAR NOT PETA the Meat-cessory line is 100% animal friendly!) Made from animal free material, this delicious piece is a humane way to get caught up in the meat fashion craze! Comes with 18" two tone (black and gold) chain Model Photos shot by Traver Rains **Meat-Lace was Featured on PerezHilton.com Click Here **Meat-Lace was Featured on NBC New York Click Here **Meat-Lace was Featured on Best Week Ever Blog Click Here **Meat-Lace was Featured on MTV show SEVEN **Meat-Lace was Featured on Ripleys Believe it or not Blog Click Here **Meat-Lace was Featured on German InTouch Magazine Click Here

name: MEAT-CUFF
description:
Meet the MEAT-CUFF! The newest accessory from the OnchMovement Meat-cessory line!

The MEAT-CUFF is guaranteed to never spoil! No matter how many times you wear it, the MEAT-CUFF will look just as fresh and delicious as the day it was first cut. Need to add flavor to an outfit? Grab a slab and some attention with the MEAT-CUFF, perfect for any occasion.

Lady Gaga and her famous meat dress serve as direct inspiration for this creation. The outrageous and controversial meat dress caused quite a stir among the fashion world, animal lovers and activists. (But FEAR NOT PETA the Meat-cessory line is 100% animal friendly!)

Made from animal free material, this delicious piece is a humane way to get caught up in the meat fashion craze!

Comes with gun metal jump rings and clasp for 2 adjustable sizes.

Model: Stephen Hampton

name: Trevor Project Flip-O-Pendant
description:
In honor of The Trevor Project Day on September 10, 2010 and National Suicide Prevention Week, September 5-11, 2010, The Trevor Project has partnered with OnchMovement Jewelry to produce this exclusive limited-edition Flip-O-Pendant. National Suicide Prevention Week is an important opportunity for The Trevor Project to educate the public about the epidemic of LGBTQ youth suicide and raise awareness of its lifesaving resources. We hope you will proudly wear this pendant to incite dialogue surrounding this very important issue.

ALL PROCEEDS TO BENEFIT
The Trevor Project. 

Flip-O-Pendants will arrive in 5-7 business days for domestic orders, up to 2 weeks for international orders.

This item is MADE IN THE USA

www.TrevorProject.org

name: Razzle Dazzle Razzberry Pop
description: The Razzle Dazzle Razzberry Pop has just the right blend of wild berries that will make your inner razzle dazzle shine through while wearing it! Each Razzle Dazzle Pop is handmade from polymer clay and measures approximately 2" in diameter and 3 1/2" tall and comes on a 16" beaded chain. Each pop is hand-stamped for authenticity. **Onch Lollipop was Featured on New York Post Click Here

name: Sunshine Citrus Pop
description: Need a little sunshine in your life? The Sunshine Citrus Pop is for you! Brighten up any outfit or day, this necklace is sure to stand out! Each Sunshine Citrus Pop is handmade from polymer clay and measures approximately 2" in diameter and 3 1/2" tall and comes on a 16" beaded chain. Each pop is hand-stamped for authenticity. **Onch Lollipop was Featured on New York Post Click Here

description: The Blue Cheese Cucumber Mint Pop looks just as delicious as it sounds. Perfect for people with eccentric tastes, this flavorful blend is for anyone looking to make a bold and fun fashion statement! Every Pop is handmade from polymer clay and measures approximately 2" in diameter and 3 1/2" tall and comes on a 16" beaded chain. Each pop is hand-stamped for authenticity. **Onch Lollipop was Featured on New York Post Click Here

Each Rainbow Pop is handmade from polymer clay and measures approximately 2" in diameter and 3 1/2" tall and comes on a 16" beaded chain. Each pop is hand-stamped for authenticity. **Onch Lollipop was Featured on New York Post Click Here

name: Princess Pop
description: Princess Pops are perfect for any Princess big or small. This bright pink lollipop is destined to help any one who wears it attract their Prince Charming! Each Princess Pop is handmade from polymer clay and measures approximately 2" in diameter and 3 1/2" tall and comes on a 16" beaded chain. Each pop is hand-stamped for authenticity. **Onch Lollipop was Featured on New York Post Click Here

name: Onch Pretzel (GLOW)
description:
Special GLOW Pretzel 

Under daylight, it looks ghostly green
but when in the dark, it glows a beautiful green glow! 
 
Onch Pretzles were inspired by my sudden cravings for sugar coated pretzels! 100% Handmade with Polymer Clay and a Swarovski rhinestone accent. 

Actual Size 2.5 inches

Each piece is unique! A perfect accessory for the summer or any pretzel fanatic!

*EVERY PRETZEL COMES WITH A 16" BEADED CHAIN
This piece is Double Baked...so its super tough!!

Shipping $6.00 US
$14.00 International

name: Pretzel Rosary
description:
Onch Pretzel Rosary

Nothing Religious. Just adding a fun and silly spin to the traditional yet trendy black rosary. 

Handmade clay Onch pretzels with two black Swarovski rhinestone accents, hanging from 26” black acrylic beaded rosary. 

Handmade in the USA.

name: Onch Red Lips Pearly Whites
description:
Onch Red Lips Pearly Whites (updated version with glossy lips!!) 

100% Handmade with Polymer clay, Genuine Fresh water cultured pearls (two front teeth) and Swarovski pearls! A unique original piece that grabs so much attention!  Inspired by collagen lip injection and teeth whitening!

*EVERY SET OF LIPS COMES WITH A 16" BEADED CHAIN

Jewelry Care Instruction: Avoid perfume and lotion on the lips. 

Original Price $150

name: Onch Pearls in a Pod XL
description:
Onch Pearls in a Pod XL. Using High quality glass/shell pearls, green polymer clay topped with a sterling silver clasp. Onch has created the Magical Pearls in a Pod perfect for Spring and Summer! Each Handmade to perfection, a piece that is simply perfect for any occasion, and any age. Thanks to the wild Imagination of Onch ;) Pearls in a Pod (XL) is approx 2” Chain is NOT included At OnchMovement.com we personally oversee each piece that goes out. However we're going on vacation. Please know that we will process all orders upon our return. (will be back Mid July)













Actress and friend, Elaine Hendrix showing off her new Pearls in a Pod XL (below)

name: Red Monchster Pretzel
description:
Red Monchster Pretzel

The original pretzel that’s been invaded by Monchsters! These Limited Edition pretzels came to be one night when the Monchsters got a hold of a fresh batch of pretzels and went crazy!! Not quite sure what happened, but the result was an eye-popping hybrid! Each pretzel is handmade from polymar clay with genuine red coral accents and dangles from a 16” beaded chain.

*Each Monchster Pretzel is Limited Edition so shape and size will vary due to the nature of handmade products.  Remember, Monchsters are delicate creatures to be well taken care of.

name: Contessa Rouge
description:
Contessa Rouge
Scientific Name: Contessa Wawa

The royal elite of the Monchster family, Contessa’s grand appearance is highlighted by two vibrantly colored giant tentacles! Relaxing on a bed of rare, red corals, carefully guarding genuine fresh water pearls is all Contessa truly cares about. This Monchster was born from polymar clay to live on a shiny plate dangling from an 18” beaded chain.

*Each Contessa is Limited Edition so shape and size will vary due to the nature of handmade products.  Remember, Monchsters are delicate creatures to be well taken care of.

Contessa is approx 4 inches in length

name: Pink Nony
description:
Pink Nony
Scientific Name: Pinkus Noniclosis

This Monchster is highly creative and intelligent. From origins unknown, this colorful creature is attracted to bright lights, superb fashion and cotton candy! The delicate Nony was born from polymer clay to live on a shiny plate dangling from an 18” beaded chain (so she can hold on tight)! 

*Each Nony is Limited Edition so shape and size will vary due to the nature of handmade products.  Remember, Monchsters are delicate creatures to be well taken care of.

Pink Nony is approx 3.5 inches in length

name: Mr. Fancy
description:
Mr. Fancy
Scientific Name: Fancilious Nimbocromis

This Monchster is boisterous and fabulously flamboyant. From deep in the waters of Deception Pass, this playful creature is attracted to the fancier things in life.  With his bright yellow and orange tentacles, Mr. Fancy can’t help but stand out. Mr. Fancy was born from polymar clay to live on a shiny plate dangling from an 18” beaded chain. 

*Each Mr. Fancy is Limited Edition so shape and size will vary due to the nature of handmade products.  Remember, Monchsters are delicate creatures to be well taken care of.

Mr Fancy is approx 3.5 inches in length

name: Onch Kate Moss Bloody Razor
description:
The infamous Bloody Razor named after top model Kate Moss. Made with an authentic white razor encased in the highest quality resin. With a splash of fresh virgin blood (I kid I kid, its really just Red Resin Pigment) to finish it off!

 This piece is so edgy and controversial it is the perfect piece to be named after our most favorite top model!


*EVERY PIECE COMES WITH A 16" BEADED CHAIN

Photo #2 
Kate Moss rocking her Bloody razor! 

Original Price $68

name: Onch Bloody Razor and Mirror
description:
Onch you glad we’ve encased this authentic razor blade in unbreakable resin? This pendant has all the essential elements. 100% screaming for attention!! This Onch Famous Razor blade and mirror, with a splash of Blood, making this piece vibrant and a serious attention grabber!! *EVERY PIECE COMES WITH A 16" BEADED CHAIN

















Amy Winehouse showing off her Bloody Razor and Mirror (Below)
